name: Empty Lot (Future Cookhouse)
description: A dusty, unremarkable patch of land, silently awaiting a future filled with the aroma of cooked meats. This barren plot sits unassuming, a stark contrast to the lively establishment it will one day become. For now, only the occasional tumbleweed rolls across its cracked earth, disturbed by the persistent whispers of a culinary future. The air carries only the faint scent of dry earth and distant sagebrush, completely devoid of the promised sizzle and spice. It's a testament to the fact that even the most legendary cookhouses must start somewhere, often as nothing more than an empty dream under a relentless sun.
